revised_title: Effects of Progesterone and Testosterone on Corpora Lutea in Rats
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on rats to study the effects of progesterone and testosterone on the corpora lutea and endometrium. They found that the administration of these hormones led to the formation of functional corpora lutea and changes in the endometrium, suggesting that these hormones can influence the reproductive system in female rats.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Reproductive Biology
